snippet.title: ConstructEx Early Access Teaser
snippet.description:
Early Access Teaser for my new game ConstructEx. 
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1915250

ConstructEx is an TPP open-world factory building sim. The motto of the game: "Explore, Harvest and Automate", automate the crafting of items and produce increasingly more complex resources and unlock new tech
